Texts.Chs:
一瓶非常淡的啤酒。
^cyan;+^white;3^cyan;防御^gray;(^white;持续45s^gray;)
^white;35%^red;减速^gray;(^white;持续10s^gray;)
^red;醉酒^gray;(^white;持续15s^gray;)^reset;
Texts.Eng:
A bottle of very pale ale
